content.description: Work up the series of diagonal rails on the slab side of the Mothership boulder.
content.location: From the main face of the Mothership, walk around the arete to the left to find the slab. Tractor Beam starts on the left side of this face.

content.description: Starts on a rail that is just right of the starting jug flake for "Alien Invasion".  Move up, using the underclings under the roof, and high feet, to reach the crimp over the ledge.  Move up to another crimp, then a sloper/crimp and top out. Cool line.
content.protection: 1-2 pads and a spotter.  A small boulder at the bottom could cause a bad fall.

content.description: Work your way up the right arete of the slab face on the Mothership. Not a particularly interesting problem, but it does provide an easy way to scope out the lip for the Abduction! dyno.
content.location: From the main face of the Mothership, walk around the arete to the left to find the slab. I Got Probed starts on the right side of this face.

content.description: Good Warm-Up problem on the right portion of the Mothership boulder. Move up on rails and good feet to a kind of weird/dihedral topout.

Start left at the huge jug flake and traverse right across the boulder on any holds, and difficult feet. Then move up to a top out on the right side of the roof.  Good Warm-up for the more difficult stuff.
Start on the same jug/flake that "Alien Invasion" does, get some high feet, and throw for the lip. Awesome Dyno.

This is the boulder right behind the massive boulder at the base of Desperate Reality Cliff.  It's shady in the winter/spring, and can get a lot of wind on windy days. Rock quality isn't nearly as sharp as the rest of the refuge though.  The landings are amazingly flat for the Refuge, as well.  All of the beta lines for the active problems are on the main photo.  I'll put up more pictures as I get out there more.
